greeting.text: Hello there! I'm River, the park ranger. Beautiful day for a stroll through Central Park, isn't it?

activities.text: Plenty! Take a seat on one of the benches, check the signpost for directions, or just wander the paths. It's all connected to the other zones from here!

wildlife.text: Keep your eyes peeled! We've got squirrels, birds, and even some butterflies fluttering about. The trees here are home to all sorts of critters.
